programme.desc: As each day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 176
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 176
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Landline - Episode 28
programme.desc: The rise of cotton in the Kimberley; A popular high school program boosting agricultural futures; and guaranteed uncontaminated oats for gluten intolerance.

programme.title: Four Corners - The Agent Inside
programme.desc: In an extraordinary Four Corners exclusive, a former ASIO agent reveals to investigative reporter Sean Rubinsztein-Dunlop how a resurgent Islamic State network is radicalising Australian teens and plotting violence.

programme.desc: Australia's leading forum for media analysis and comment. Host Linton Besser, a four-time Walkley award-winning investigative reporter and former foreign correspondent, brings you a fearless critique of the week's journalism.

programme.desc: Bergen County (NJ) Chief of Detectives Robert Anzilotti elicited murder confessions from a vicious but relatively unknown serial killer Richard Cottingham, nicknamed the Torso Killer.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S3)

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1)
programme.desc: A man's body is found in a wooded area and the victim's neighbour is brought into the interrogation room, where evidence mounts even as he's being interviewed.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S2)
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country: a man drives through a store hours after having trashed it; a Florida neighbourhood falls victim to shocking deliveries; and more!

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S1)
programme.desc: A man leads police on a high-speed chase in a stolen mail truck. A restaurant owner is arrested after hiding drugs in a takeout box. A pizza delivery guy helps the cops arrest a thief; and more.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Christine and Jason Harris fell in love young. Christina finds Jason caring and supportive and after marrying, they have two children. But then Christina makes a shocking discovery.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S4)
programme.desc: A man falls asleep while driving and kills a construction worker on the road. Was he a reckless driver or an innocent man with an undiagnosed medical condition?

programme.title: Beyond the Headlines: The Tanya Kach Story With Elizabeth Smart
programme.desc: In a revealing conversation, Tanya recounts the horror of the 10 years she spent in captivity in her predator's bedroom, and confides in Elizabeth about the realities of grooming.

programme.desc: Theres a new babblist in town- someone who claims to understand baby talk. Boss Baby spots this fraud right away;and must debunk his tactics before he scams the playgroup parents. Meanwhile;Tim tries to sell magazines with Boss Babys help.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his big bad year on the zodiac calendar which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNais superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he breaks up with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crews life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items but Jin and Peng arent so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toads magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Its Chinese New Year! programme.title: CSI S5 E10 - No Humans Involved
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), theres something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.title: ALF S1 E22 - It's Not Easy...Bein' Green

programme.title: Airwolf S1 E11 - Mind Of The Machine
programme.desc: Airwolf is an American action military drama television series that centers on a high-technology military helicopter, code-named Airwolf, and its crew. The show follows them as they undertake various exotic missions, many involving espionage.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join award-winning Malaysian actress Siti Saleha and her husband as they explore the city by day and venture into the night, discovering its vibrant culture and hidden treasures.

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the bros!

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: Totally Outnumbered
programme.desc: Totally Outnumbered is a unique Japanese variety game show where one supreme professional from a specific area of expertise faces off with a large group of amateurs in original competitions in each episode.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.desc: While everyone sleeps peacefully, one may wonder what the Barbababies could be dreaming about. // To dream makes you grow... But what can Barbidur, Barbalala, Barbotine and Barbidou possibly dream of?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When three big mail deliveries are needed around the world, there's only one monster machine who can deliver it all: Mail Truck Blaze! He'll swim across seas, climb mountains, and venture to the Monster Dome --because mail trucks ALWAYS deliver!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: It's Grammy's birthday but Crusher doesn't have enough money for a special gift! So, Blaze and AJ help him do different jobs and earn the money for Grammy's present. But, they have to hurry so they can be back in time for Grammy's birthday party!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When a grizzled old prospector discovers gold in Adventure Bay, its a bona fide, dog gone, gold rush! // When Mayor Humdinger and the Kit-tastrophe Crew try to steal the Paw Patroller, the chase becomes a rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger challenges the Adventure Bay team to a soccer match, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol are called in to play. // The Paw Patrol must work as a team to overcome some dirty tricks by Mayor Humdinger and pull out a victory!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Francois accidentally crashes his diving bell, Paw Patrol must rescue him, a Pupfish, and a pod of whales.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Today is the championship game, but all of Dora's friends have a cold. Dora helps them feel better in time to play!

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora gets a new puppy that makes her cat Lucky jealous. After he runs away, Dora tracks Lucky down to remind him of how loved he is.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle is very good at skiing and was once a world champion! But in the end it is Mummy Pig who impresses everyone...

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: It's raining and Peppa is sad because she can't go out to play. When the rain stops, Peppa feels better and she and George get ready to play one of their favorite games - jumping in mud puddles!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa Pig's best friend, Suzy Sheep, comes over to visit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house, and meet their new parrot, Polly.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Young Franois witnesses the birth of Barbapapa. // Barbapapa is a prisoner in a zoo.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbapapa finds refuge in the house that Franois' parents built for him. // The house of Barbapapa is far too small now that Barbamama and the Barbabb have arrived in his life.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Caf Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost so that he can take Danny's new skateboard. // Ryder and the Pups race to save Mayor Goodway's Glow-in-the-Dark Party guests when a frightened Alien Boy zaps them into floating space bubbles.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. // Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: The Barbababies want to invent like Leonardo da Vinci. // The Barbababies must choose between going to the pool or going for a bike ride.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbidur and Barbalala become little rebels. // But who are the Barbapapa?

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: Nicholas works as a dentist in Canada. However, he faces difficulties when a new neighbour moves in and he learns that he is Jimmy Tudeski, a contract killer, who is also known as Jimmy The Tulip.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the future, criminals are caught before the crimes they commit, but one of the officers in the special unit is accused of one such crime and sets out to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Tears Of The Sun
programme.desc: In Tears of the Sun, a Navy SEAL team is sent to rescue a doctor in war-torn Nigeria. The mission shifts from extraction to saving refugees as they face brutal rebels while navigating the dangerous jungle.

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: Nicholas works as a dentist in Canada. However, he faces difficulties when a new neighbour moves in and he learns that he is Jimmy Tudeski, a contract killer, who is also known as Jimmy The Tulip.

programme.title: Hard Target
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this John Woo action thriller where a man battles a deadly group that hunts humans for sport. Also features Lance Henriksen and Wilford Brimley.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit, the mischievous and adventurous hero who has captivated generations of readers, now takes on the starring role of his own cute, contemporary comedy with attitude.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: When the old-old-old-fashioned vampire Vlad arrives at the hotel for an impromptu family get-together, Hotel Transylvania is in for a collision of supernatural old-school and modern day cool.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
programme.desc: As a string of mysterious killings grip Seattle, Bella, whose high school graduation is fast approaching, is forced to choose between her love for vampire Edward and her friendship with werewolf Jacob.

programme.title: Dragonheart: Vengeance
programme.desc: Lukas (Jack Kane), a young farmer whose family is killed by savage raiders in the countryside, sets out on an epic quest for revenge.

programme.title: The One
programme.desc: A cop must fight his evil double from a parallel universe in order to save himself and the world.

programme.title: Tears Of The Sun
programme.desc: In Tears of the Sun, a Navy SEAL team is sent to rescue a doctor in war-torn Nigeria. The mission shifts from extraction to saving refugees as they face brutal rebels while navigating the dangerous jungle.

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: Nicholas works as a dentist in Canada. However, he faces difficulties when a new neighbour moves in and he learns that he is Jimmy Tudeski, a contract killer, who is also known as Jimmy The Tulip.

programme.title: Hard Target
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this John Woo action thriller where a man battles a deadly group that hunts humans for sport. Also features Lance Henriksen and Wilford Brimley.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: When the old-old-old-fashioned vampire Vlad arrives at the hotel for an impromptu family get-together, Hotel Transylvania is in for a collision of supernatural old-school and modern day cool.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: An American backpacker gets involved with a ring of drug smugglers as their driver, though he winds up on the run from his employers across Munich's high-speed Autobahn.

programme.title: DOC - In Your Hands S2

programme.title: DOC - In Your Hands S2
programme.desc: A return to the months of the first wave, to finally discover the secret that Doc and his people are hiding.

programme.title: The Scorpion King 4: Quest For Power

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2

programme.desc: Jia Hao and his friends gather to celebrate his birthday at a villa. However, the festivities take a dark turn when they connect to a deadly VR game in which they must light candles and dodge ghosts to survive. Tragedy strikes as two of his friends fall victim to the escalating horrors within, plunging them all deeper into a chilling nightmare.

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.title: Never Leave
programme.desc: Strange incidents keep happening in Lin Yue's house after a car accident: her sister cannot see the images of her family members in the mirror; her father is peeping at night; and there is the sound of marbles from the attic every day at dawn. Following the sound to the attic, Lin Yue finds her own death portrait as she opens the door...

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: Red Snow
programme.desc: Olivia, an outstanding vampire romance novelist, longs to encounter a real vampire. Her wish comes true when Luke turns up at her remote snowbound cabin seeking for help. However, her dream transforms into a chilling nightmare on Christmas Eve when Luke's vampire companions track him down...

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: A series of strange events is happening in a peaceful village, including a corpse that is resurrected from its grave and ran away. As the villagers investigate, a villain dies and the village head also goes missing. Police investigation ensues, but as the truths start to unveil, more mysteries are unfolding. Who is the one behind them all?

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jia Hao and his friends gather to celebrate his birthday at a villa. However, the festivities take a dark turn when they connect to a deadly VR game in which they must light candles and dodge ghosts to survive. Tragedy strikes as two of his friends fall victim to the escalating horrors within, plunging them all deeper into a chilling nightmare.

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.title: Never Leave
programme.desc: Strange incidents keep happening in Lin Yue's house after a car accident: her sister cannot see the images of her family members in the mirror; her father is peeping at night; and there is the sound of marbles from the attic every day at dawn. Following the sound to the attic, Lin Yue finds her own death portrait as she opens the door...

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: Watch Me Kill
programme.desc: A ruthless assassin named Luciana is hired by a kingpin to murder a man with a valuable diamond. Complications ensue when Luciana stumbles upon a teenage girl who is held captive by the man, and the kingpin discovers that the diamond Luciana turned over is fake.

programme.title: Encroach
programme.desc: University freshman Zhen Xin finds her classmates, except You Mei, very unfriendly to her, and the two quickly became good friends. Zhen Xin lives in the dormitory and constantly hears strange noises. When she was attacked by a man in black, You Mei saved her and the latters identity is also revealed.

programme.title: Behave
programme.desc: Following the death of their friend, a group of young adults travels to a villa on the outskirts of London that contains a deep mystery. As unsettling events escalate during their luxurious stay, they must unravel the villas dark secrets.

programme.title: Sinister Doll
programme.desc: A teenager, Pelangi, chances upon a banana tree plantation which is guarded by a mysterious old man. Apart from finding out that a young girl was buried with her favourite doll in this banana plantation decades ago, Pelangi also uncovers a horrifying secret about her death

programme.title: Jealousy
programme.desc: Model Min is admitted to a hospital, but mysteriously falls to her death at night. Rumour has it that the hospital is haunted. Subsequently, Min's photographer begins receiving eerie phone calls, the writer loses consciousness in a bizarre car accident, and her friend mysteriously disappears

programme.title: Pilot
programme.desc: Han Jung-woo. a star pilot suffers a drastic fall due to a momentary mistake was blacklisted from all airline. In a desperate bid for survival, he adopts a new identity as his younger sister and manages to find re-employment, yet this newfound stability is soon threatened...

programme.title: The Fatal Encounter
programme.desc: King Jeongjo, known as The King of Misfortune, fights to survive an assassination attempt with the help of his loyal servant, who has a secret connection to the assassin.

programme.title: The Beast
programme.desc: Two rival detectives compete against each other to catch the notorious killer who shakes up Korea by their gruesome murders.

programme.title: Because I Love You
programme.desc: After an accident, a talented songwriter transforms into a messenger of love by connecting people who having trouble finding love and expressing their feelings.

programme.title: Forbidden Dream
programme.desc: Two Korean inventors develop a 20-year relationship while advancing the field of astronomy.

programme.title: Bear Man
programme.desc: Two bears from the Institute of techonolgy have turned into humans after eating garlic and mugwort. Yet, one has grown up into a police, while one has become a gangster...

programme.title: Hear Me: Our Summer
programme.desc: Yong-jun is working as a delivery man when he meets and instantly falls for Yeo-reum, the devoted sister of a gifter deaf swimmer. Yeo-reum slowly opens her heart to warm-hearted Yong-jun.

programme.title: War Of The Arrows
programme.desc: Set during the second Manchu invasion of Korea, Nam Yi, the best archer in Korea, goes up against the Qing Dynasty to rescue his younger sister Ja In - who was to be enslaved by the Manchurians.

programme.title: The Terror, Live
programme.desc: A newsman discovers he's been rigged with a bomb after he has an exclusive interview with a terrorist who blew up a bridge.

programme.title: Mr. Zoo: The Missing Vip
programme.desc: After discovering he can suddenly talk to animals, an intelligence agent partners with a canine pal to handle a case that has gone sideways.

programme.title: 71: Into The Fire
programme.desc: 71 student-soldiers fight an impossible war against the elite 766 Commando Brigade and turn the tide of the Korean War.

programme.title: Bottom Of The Water
programme.desc: Ga-young's sister died six year ago. One day, Ga-young is chased by a vengeful water spirit who appears as her sister. She strives to solve the mystery of her sister's tragic death.

programme.title: Code Name: Jackal
programme.desc: Minjung, a clumsy hitman, is hired to kill K-pop star Hyun, who is staying in a hotel where the police are conducting a stakeout for a serial killer.

programme.title: EXchange 3

programme.desc: A magical story of growth and self-discovery about a CODA boy with talents in music who accidentally travels back to 1995, meets his father who just turned 18, and together they form a band called "Watermelon Sugar".

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 5
programme.desc: Back on the bayou, the buyers are ready to crack open the abandoned lockers and throw down some serious cash. Local legend FJ sees big dollar signs in old voodoo artifacts. Brandon and Lori unearth a rare find with a potentially priceless payout. Andall bets are off when a bidding war over endangered species taxidermy ends in a heated stand-off with the local authorities.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 6
programme.desc: The buyers press their luck in Sin City where Brandon and Lori get outfoxed by a group of locals with a questionable strategy. Then, Jesse gambles on a locker filled with junk. Everyone thinks he's crazy, but he knows something they don't. And later,vintage slot machines and poker tables send bidding through the roof. The closing price is stratospheric, but what's hidden from sight will be the ultimate payday for one lucky Storage Hunter.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 3
programme.desc: At a ski shop, Michael demonstrates the latest in winter gear: a hat that also makes hot cocoa. And later, when taking inventory at an abandoned garage, Michael stuns his co-worker when a ghostly violin strikes a chord.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 4
programme.desc: Michael shows off a seashell from the seashore - that still has the seashore in it - and reveals desserts that break the mold. Plus, at a farm, Michael startles his assistant with a trick that's "out-of-this-world".

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 7
programme.desc: Jesse taunts Brandon and Lori in the hopes of instigating a fight and later unearths a ticking treasure. Then, seasoned local Victor throws down his bankroll for a trove of luxury goods, but are they actually knock-offs? And later, Brandon and Lori think they've hit the jackpot with a cache of firearms, but when Lori's gun accidentally goes off inside the locker, Brandon is caught in the crosshairs.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 8
programme.desc: Brandon and Lori return to Boston and square off against his former protege Wade. The bad blood may just erupt into a full-out brawl on the auction floor. Then, a former military hero goes all in on a locker that turns out to be hiding the ultimate score. And later, the contents of a unit spark an outrage among the buyers, but Brandon only sees dollar signs. Will he walk away or will this controversial cache crush his morals?

programme.title: The Closer S7 3
programme.desc: Flynn and Provenza hope to make easy money by serving court papers, but, once again, find themselves in hot water when a man is killed minutes later. ADAM ARKIN guest stars.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 23
programme.desc: In addition to the curse of Yasohachi Bridge, Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki face off against Kechizu, one of the special grade cursed objects: Cursed Wombs: Death Paintings. The three start fighting within the barrier of Yasohachi Bridge's curse, but something suddenly seizes Kugisaki's arm and drags her outside the barrier. Itadori and Kechizu chase after her, leaving the barrier. Left behind, Fushiguro quickly takes of the Yasohachi Bridge curse--until he witnesses a shocking sight.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 24
programme.desc: The Cursed Wombs: Death Paintings, Eso and Kechizu, face off against Itadori and Kugisaki, but the two begin to rot after they're bathed in the blood of Eso and Kechizu. Driven into a corner, Kugisaki hammers a nail into herself to activate Resonance and start a game of chicken with the brothers. Itadori refuses to stop and continues to attack Kechizu, but-- This whole mission began with one of Ryomen Sukuna's

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Over a decade ago, a pathway called a "gate" appeared, which connected this world to another dimension. People called those who fought against the monsters on the other side of the gate "hunters."

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Jinwoo and the others are exploring a low-ranked dungeon, and they step into a temple dungeon they've never seen before. What awaits them inside are three rules, along with a monster that sends them into despair beyond fear.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: Jinwoo remained alone in the temple dungeon to save what's left of his party.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: Jinwoo enters an instance dungeon from the entrance of a subway and levels up as he defeats monsters.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: Hwang Dongsuks party is short on their member quota to raid a C-rank dungeon. Jinwoo, along with another member, Yoo Jinho, join them in bolstering their numbers and the party makes easy work of the monsters and proceeds on.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: It seemed like the raid of the C-rank dungeon was going well.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: While clearing the C-rank dungeon, Jinwoo annihilates every member of Hwang Dongsuk's party, who had tried to kill him for personal gains.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: Jinwoo has been looking for the item displayed in the window, the Elixir of Life, for his sick mother. But the quest to obtain this item is too difficult for Jinwoo that it would be nearly suicidal to attempt.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: At B20:C20r's Association, Jinwoo is reunited with Song Chiyul, Lee Joohee, Kim Sangshik, and Kang Jeongho, who have survived the Cartenon Temple. And he goes to explore the D-rank dungeon with Kang Taeshik and the others from the Surveillance Team.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: After the battle with Kang Taeshik, Jinwoo survives the tragedy once again. However, Woo Jinchul warns him that Hwang Dongsoo, an S-rank hunter, may be after Jinwoo's life.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: Out of the blue, a "job-change quest" pops up in Jinwoo's window. Feeling that it may help him get stronger, Jinwoo sets foot into a gate.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: Despite being cornered, Jinwoo manages to defeat the Crimson Knight, Igris. Without a moment of respite, another window pops up to announce a new quest.

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Izuku Midoriya desperately wants to be a hero, but he is one of the few in his generation born without a Quirk. Will meeting the number one hero, All Might, change his fate?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Izuku accidentally learns of All Might's secret, but there's trouble in town again before Izuku has time to process it. Will All Might be able to save the day again?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: All Might tells Izuku that he can become a hero, but does he really have what it takes to become one?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: At the entrance exam, Izuku falls behind as the other students defeat faux villains left and right. Will he be able to get enough points to pass?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: It's Izuku's first day of high school, and he still can't control his new Quirk. Will he make it to the second day of school with his eccentric new teacher?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: Izuku somehow gets through his first day of school and falls into a regular schedule of classes and training at U.A. In their first class with All Might

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: Izuku is up against Katsuki in their first class with All Might! Can he and Uraraka beat the villain team of Katsuki and Tenya before time runs out?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: After the combat training lesson, the students and All Might reflect on their matches as they think about their next steps.

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: Class 1-A has to elect a class representative, and everyone wants the job! How will they choose? And what lies in wait for them at the next class?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: Villains have attacked USJ, and it's up to Class 1-A to stop them. What are the villains after? Will All Might be able to save the day again?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: The students of Class 1-A are up against the League of Villains. Will they survive long enough for help to arrive?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: All Might has finally shown up, but will he be able to defeat Nomu and save the day?!

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 13
programme.desc: As the battle at USJ winds down, Izuku and All Might think about its repercussions. Meanwhile, the villains slink home to plan their next move.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Ryomen Sukuna

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Itadori wakes up in an unfamiliar room and before him rests Gojo Satoru, a teacher at Jujutsu High, who declares Itadori's secret execution has been decided upon. Gojo presents Itadori with two options. He can be executed immediately, or he can hunt down all 20 of Ryomen Sukuna's fingers and die after absorbing all of them...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: Itadori, Fushiguro, and Gojo head out to meet up with the third first year, Kugizaki Nobara. Thereafter they head to an abandoned building where Gojo tasks Itadori and Kugizaki with exorcising the curses lurking inside. Once inside the building Itadori and Kugizaki split up to look for the curses and Kugizaki faces off against a cunning curse that takes a child hostage.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: An emergency breaks out at a juvenile detention center and Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki are dispatched to handle it. Their mission is to verify and rescue any survivors left inside with the curse womb that could develop into a special grade cursed spirit. Itadori and the others storm in to find a merciless reality waiting for them. Immediately thereafter, Kugisaki disappears and the special grade cursed spirit appears beside Itadori and Fushiguro.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: After retreating outside the juvenile detention center, Fushiguro notices the death of the special grade cursed spirit. The very next moment Ryomen Sukuna appears beside him, and rips Itadori's heart from his body to take him hostage. Fushiguro begins fighting Sukuna to prevent Itadori from dying when he regains control, but he becomes painfully aware of the difference in their strength

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: Gojo stews in his frustration over Itadori's death. Both Fushiguro and Nobara are depressed by their teammate's death, but they begin their special training with the second year students to get stronger. Meanwhile, Geto and the others begin to make their move. And during all of that, the dead Itadori...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: While in transit Gojo is suddenly attacked by the special grade cursed spirit Jogo. After launching several attacks that never hit--Jogo comes face to face with Gojo's strength. In an instant Gojo returns to Jujutsu High and easily picks up mid-training Itadori which causes Jogo's anger to erupt. He takes his next move, to which Gojo

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: While they're training for the exchange event, Kugisaki and Fushiguro come face to face with Kyoto's Jujutsu High second years - Zen'in Mai and Todo - who challenge them to a fight. Todo overwhelms Fushiguro with physical strength. Meanwhile, Kugisaki is disgusted by Mai's comments and says something to provoke her

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: Yoshino Junpei skips school to go to a movie theater, but then he witnesses the classmates who bullied him getting their faces transfigured and dying. He chases after the culprit and calls out to them. Later, Itadori and the ex-salaryman first-grade jujutsu sorcerer, Nanami Kento, storm into the scene of the crime within the theater and encounter two cursed spirits.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: Itadori is placed in charge of investigating Yoshino, so he turns to his assistant supervisor, Ijichi for a plan. Their plan to have a low-level curse attack Yoshino and gauge his response fails, so Itadori speaks to him directly. After watching Itadori ultimately drive away the teacher he hated, Yoshino decides to hear him out. Meanwhile, Nanami has pinned down Mahito's base and he delves into the underground sewers to face Mahito.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: Mahito corners Nanami, but he releases the limiter on his cursed energy, destroying the wall of the underground channel with Ratio Technique: Collapse, and causing rubble to rain down upon them. Meanwhile, Itadori makes contact with Yoshino and they hit it off after talking about movies. He meets Yoshino's mother, and after being invited into their home, more is revealed...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: Mahito deftly uses Yoshino's admiration toward him to make him fight Itadori. Yoshino races toward vengeance and Itadori exchanges blows with him to try and make him explain his motive, which leads to him learning the cruel truth from Yoshino's lips.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 13
programme.desc: Nanami steps in at the last second to save Itadori from Mahito's blow. Then Itadori and Nanami match their attacks together to ensure they can exorcise Mahito. Mahito pulls out his transfigured humans in an attempt to mentally drive Itadori into a corner, but Itadori manages to overcome them. As Mahito grows trapped under their rain of blows he senses his pending death

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 14
programme.desc: After escaping from Itadori and Nanami, Mojito reunites with Geto and the others to try and move their plan forward. Meanwhile, Jujutsu High is about to host its Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event. Fushiguro, Kugisaki and the second years Maki, Toge, and Panda all meet up to greet Todo and the other Kyoto students on arrival. Sparks immediately start to fly when Gojo rushes in late to the meetup and presents his surprise

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 15
programme.desc: The Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event's group battle begins. Kyoto's Todo rushes to attack the Tokyo students, but Itadori takes on the role of stopping him and faces off against him. Itadori's overwhelmed by Todo's power, but suddenly Todo asks him what kind of woman is his type

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 16
programme.desc: Todo points out that Itadori's Divergent Fist is a technique that won't work against special grades. When Itadori genuinely accepts his advice, Todo decides to face him and guide him with his full might. Meanwhile, Kugisaki picks a fight with Kyoto's Nishimiya. From the sidelines Mechamaru fires an attack at Panda, sparking the start of their battles with Kugisaki against Nishimiya and Panda against Mechamaru.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 17
programme.desc: The Exchange Event's Group Battle continues! Maki and Miwa face off, but Miwa can't hide her surprise at the overwhelming strength Maki displays despite her grade ranking. At the same time, Kugisaki pursues Nishimiya as she flies around on her broom. Nishimiya talks about Mai's hardships and what it's like to live as a female jujutsu sorcerer, but Kugisaki cuts her off and counterattacks. Then Mai reveals herself

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 18
programme.desc: Battles are starting to be decided in different locations on the first day of the Exchange Event. Fushiguro faces off against Kamo, the heir to one of the three major clans. Kamo uses Blood Manipulation, a technique that controls his own blood, while Fushiguro fights him with shikigami and martial arts

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 19
programme.desc: The special grade cursed spirit, Hanami, suddenly intrudes on the Exchange Event. Fushiguro, Inumaki, and Kamo face off against Hanami, defending themselves as they race to cross the veil. The three are driven into a corner when Maki joins the fight and strings together a chain of attacks in combination with Fushiguro. However, even with that, they're still forced into dire straits by Hanami's overwhelming prowess.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 20
programme.desc: Itadori and Todo join the battle against Hanami. Itadori lands his Black Flash, and his Todo unleashes his cursed technique as they keep up their combo attack. Alongside his "brother", Itadori, Todo overwhelms Hanami with his tricky cursed technique and his clever, (self-proclaimed) 530,000 IQ mental CPU,

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 21
programme.desc: Gojo has driven Hanami away with his overwhelming strength. Mahito reunites with Hanami, who's on the verge of death, after stealing Sukuna's fingers and the Special Grade Cursed Object, Death Painting Wombs 1 through 3. They're steadily making progress with their preparations to seal Gojo Satoru on October 31st. Meanwhile, those with Jujutsu High are unable to discern the cursed spirits' objective.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 22
programme.desc: Three men have died under similar circumstances from a cursed spirit. Investigators discover the victims all attended the same middle school, so Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki are dispatched to investigate. Once they arrive, they learn it was Fushiguro's old middle school. There they learn that the victims were all found unconscious beneath Yasohachi Bridge, a local haunted location. They also learn that Fushiguro's older sister, Tsumiki, is caught up in this incident as well

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 23
programme.desc: In addition to the curse of Yasohachi Bridge, Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki face off against Kechizu, one of the special grade cursed objects: Cursed Wombs: Death Paintings. The three start fighting within the barrier of Yasohachi Bridge's curse, but something suddenly seizes Kugisaki's arm and drags her outside the barrier. Itadori and Kechizu chase after her, leaving the barrier. Left behind, Fushiguro quickly takes of the Yasohachi Bridge curse--until he witnesses a shocking sight.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 24
programme.desc: The Cursed Wombs: Death Paintings, Eso and Kechizu, face off against Itadori and Kugisaki, but the two begin to rot after they're bathed in the blood of Eso and Kechizu. Driven into a corner, Kugisaki hammers a nail into herself to activate Resonance and start a game of chicken with the brothers. Itadori refuses to stop and continues to attack Kechizu, but-- This whole mission began with one of Ryomen Sukuna's

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Over a decade ago, a pathway called a "gate" appeared, which connected this world to another dimension. People called those who fought against the monsters on the other side of the gate "hunters."

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Jinwoo and the others are exploring a low-ranked dungeon, and they step into a temple dungeon they've never seen before. What awaits them inside are three rules, along with a monster that sends them into despair beyond fear.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: Jinwoo remained alone in the temple dungeon to save what's left of his party.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: Jinwoo enters an instance dungeon from the entrance of a subway and levels up as he defeats monsters.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: Hwang Dongsuks party is short on their member quota to raid a C-rank dungeon. Jinwoo, along with another member, Yoo Jinho, join them in bolstering their numbers and the party makes easy work of the monsters and proceeds on.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: It seemed like the raid of the C-rank dungeon was going well.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: While clearing the C-rank dungeon, Jinwoo annihilates every member of Hwang Dongsuk's party, who had tried to kill him for personal gains.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: Jinwoo has been looking for the item displayed in the window, the Elixir of Life, for his sick mother. But the quest to obtain this item is too difficult for Jinwoo that it would be nearly suicidal to attempt.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: At B20:C20r's Association, Jinwoo is reunited with Song Chiyul, Lee Joohee, Kim Sangshik, and Kang Jeongho, who have survived the Cartenon Temple. And he goes to explore the D-rank dungeon with Kang Taeshik and the others from the Surveillance Team.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: After the battle with Kang Taeshik, Jinwoo survives the tragedy once again. However, Woo Jinchul warns him that Hwang Dongsoo, an S-rank hunter, may be after Jinwoo's life.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: Out of the blue, a "job-change quest" pops up in Jinwoo's window. Feeling that it may help him get stronger, Jinwoo sets foot into a gate.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: Despite being cornered, Jinwoo manages to defeat the Crimson Knight, Igris. Without a moment of respite, another window pops up to announce a new quest.

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: All Might tells Izuku that he can become a hero, but does he really have what it takes to become one?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Izuku accidentally learns of All Might's secret, but there's trouble in town again before Izuku has time to process it. Will All Might be able to save the day again?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: All Might tells Izuku that he can become a hero, but does he really have what it takes to become one?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: At the entrance exam, Izuku falls behind as the other students defeat faux villains left and right. Will he be able to get enough points to pass?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: It's Izuku's first day of high school, and he still can't control his new Quirk. Will he make it to the second day of school with his eccentric new teacher?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: Izuku somehow gets through his first day of school and falls into a regular schedule of classes and training at U.A. In their first class with All Might

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: Izuku is up against Katsuki in their first class with All Might! Can he and Uraraka beat the villain team of Katsuki and Tenya before time runs out?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: After the combat training lesson, the students and All Might reflect on their matches as they think about their next steps.

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: Class 1-A has to elect a class representative, and everyone wants the job! How will they choose? And what lies in wait for them at the next class?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: Villains have attacked USJ, and it's up to Class 1-A to stop them. What are the villains after? Will All Might be able to save the day again?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: The students of Class 1-A are up against the League of Villains. Will they survive long enough for help to arrive?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: All Might has finally shown up, but will he be able to defeat Nomu and save the day?!

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 13
programme.desc: As the battle at USJ winds down, Izuku and All Might think about its repercussions. Meanwhile, the villains slink home to plan their next move.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Ryomen Sukuna

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Itadori wakes up in an unfamiliar room and before him rests Gojo Satoru, a teacher at Jujutsu High, who declares Itadori's secret execution has been decided upon. Gojo presents Itadori with two options. He can be executed immediately, or he can hunt down all 20 of Ryomen Sukuna's fingers and die after absorbing all of them...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: Itadori, Fushiguro, and Gojo head out to meet up with the third first year, Kugizaki Nobara. Thereafter they head to an abandoned building where Gojo tasks Itadori and Kugizaki with exorcising the curses lurking inside. Once inside the building Itadori and Kugizaki split up to look for the curses and Kugizaki faces off against a cunning curse that takes a child hostage.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: An emergency breaks out at a juvenile detention center and Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki are dispatched to handle it. Their mission is to verify and rescue any survivors left inside with the curse womb that could develop into a special grade cursed spirit. Itadori and the others storm in to find a merciless reality waiting for them. Immediately thereafter, Kugisaki disappears and the special grade cursed spirit appears beside Itadori and Fushiguro.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: After retreating outside the juvenile detention center, Fushiguro notices the death of the special grade cursed spirit. The very next moment Ryomen Sukuna appears beside him, and rips Itadori's heart from his body to take him hostage. Fushiguro begins fighting Sukuna to prevent Itadori from dying when he regains control, but he becomes painfully aware of the difference in their strength

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: Gojo stews in his frustration over Itadori's death. Both Fushiguro and Nobara are depressed by their teammate's death, but they begin their special training with the second year students to get stronger. Meanwhile, Geto and the others begin to make their move. And during all of that, the dead Itadori...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: While in transit Gojo is suddenly attacked by the special grade cursed spirit Jogo. After launching several attacks that never hit--Jogo comes face to face with Gojo's strength. In an instant Gojo returns to Jujutsu High and easily picks up mid-training Itadori which causes Jogo's anger to erupt. He takes his next move, to which Gojo

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: While they're training for the exchange event, Kugisaki and Fushiguro come face to face with Kyoto's Jujutsu High second years - Zen'in Mai and Todo - who challenge them to a fight. Todo overwhelms Fushiguro with physical strength. Meanwhile, Kugisaki is disgusted by Mai's comments and says something to provoke her

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: Yoshino Junpei skips school to go to a movie theater, but then he witnesses the classmates who bullied him getting their faces transfigured and dying. He chases after the culprit and calls out to them. Later, Itadori and the ex-salaryman first-grade jujutsu sorcerer, Nanami Kento, storm into the scene of the crime within the theater and encounter two cursed spirits.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: Itadori is placed in charge of investigating Yoshino, so he turns to his assistant supervisor, Ijichi for a plan. Their plan to have a low-level curse attack Yoshino and gauge his response fails, so Itadori speaks to him directly. After watching Itadori ultimately drive away the teacher he hated, Yoshino decides to hear him out. Meanwhile, Nanami has pinned down Mahito's base and he delves into the underground sewers to face Mahito.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: Mahito corners Nanami, but he releases the limiter on his cursed energy, destroying the wall of the underground channel with Ratio Technique: Collapse, and causing rubble to rain down upon them. Meanwhile, Itadori makes contact with Yoshino and they hit it off after talking about movies. He meets Yoshino's mother, and after being invited into their home, more is revealed...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: Mahito deftly uses Yoshino's admiration toward him to make him fight Itadori. Yoshino races toward vengeance and Itadori exchanges blows with him to try and make him explain his motive, which leads to him learning the cruel truth from Yoshino's lips.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 13
programme.desc: Nanami steps in at the last second to save Itadori from Mahito's blow. Then Itadori and Nanami match their attacks together to ensure they can exorcise Mahito. Mahito pulls out his transfigured humans in an attempt to mentally drive Itadori into a corner, but Itadori manages to overcome them. As Mahito grows trapped under their rain of blows he senses his pending death

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 14
programme.desc: After escaping from Itadori and Nanami, Mojito reunites with Geto and the others to try and move their plan forward. Meanwhile, Jujutsu High is about to host its Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event. Fushiguro, Kugisaki and the second years Maki, Toge, and Panda all meet up to greet Todo and the other Kyoto students on arrival. Sparks immediately start to fly when Gojo rushes in late to the meetup and presents his surprise

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 15
programme.desc: The Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event's group battle begins. Kyoto's Todo rushes to attack the Tokyo students, but Itadori takes on the role of stopping him and faces off against him. Itadori's overwhelmed by Todo's power, but suddenly Todo asks him what kind of woman is his type

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 16
programme.desc: Todo points out that Itadori's Divergent Fist is a technique that won't work against special grades. When Itadori genuinely accepts his advice, Todo decides to face him and guide him with his full might. Meanwhile, Kugisaki picks a fight with Kyoto's Nishimiya. From the sidelines Mechamaru fires an attack at Panda, sparking the start of their battles with Kugisaki against Nishimiya and Panda against Mechamaru.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 17
programme.desc: The Exchange Event's Group Battle continues! Maki and Miwa face off, but Miwa can't hide her surprise at the overwhelming strength Maki displays despite her grade ranking. At the same time, Kugisaki pursues Nishimiya as she flies around on her broom. Nishimiya talks about Mai's hardships and what it's like to live as a female jujutsu sorcerer, but Kugisaki cuts her off and counterattacks. Then Mai reveals herself

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 18
programme.desc: Battles are starting to be decided in different locations on the first day of the Exchange Event. Fushiguro faces off against Kamo, the heir to one of the three major clans. Kamo uses Blood Manipulation, a technique that controls his own blood, while Fushiguro fights him with shikigami and martial arts

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 19
programme.desc: The special grade cursed spirit, Hanami, suddenly intrudes on the Exchange Event. Fushiguro, Inumaki, and Kamo face off against Hanami, defending themselves as they race to cross the veil. The three are driven into a corner when Maki joins the fight and strings together a chain of attacks in combination with Fushiguro. However, even with that, they're still forced into dire straits by Hanami's overwhelming prowess.

programme.title: Crank: High Voltage
programme.desc: Chelios faces a Chinese mobster who has stolen his nearly indestructible heart and replaced it with a battery-powered ticker which requires regular jolts of electricity to keep working.

programme.title: Men of War
programme.desc: A former Special Ops soldier leads a group of mercenaries to an island in the South China Sea: their mission is obtain the rights to the unusual treasure that the island beholds.

programme.title: Mercenary for Justice
programme.desc: A mercenary gets involved in a mission that threatens the lives of his kin. In order to succeed, he must break into one of the most well guarded prisons in Eastern Europe and free the son of the most notorious drug lord in the world today.

programme.title: Ninja
programme.desc: A westerner named Casey, studying Ninjutsu in Japan, is asked by the Sensei to return to New York to protect the legendary Yoroi Bitsu, an armored chest that contains the weapons of the last Koga Ninja.

programme.title: Replicant
programme.desc: Scientists create a genetic clone of a serial killer in order to help catch the killer, teaming up with two cops.

programme.title: The Legend Of Hercules
programme.desc: The origin story of the mythical Greek hero. Betrayed by his stepfather, the King, and exiled and sold into slavery because of a forbidden love, Hercules must use his formidable powers to fight his way back to his rightful kingdom.

programme.title: Red Riding Hood
programme.desc: Set in a medieval village that is haunted by a werewolf, a young girl falls for an orphaned woodcutter, much to her family's displeasure.

programme.title: Fast Charlie
programme.desc: For twenty years, Charlie Swift has been a fixer and hitman for a mob boss named Stan. After a rival boss puts a hit on Stan and his crew, Charlie is the sole survivor. Charlie decides to avenge his friend.

programme.title: Underworld
programme.desc: Selene, a vampire warrior, is entrenched in a conflict between vampires and werewolves, while falling in love with Michael, a human who is sought by werewolves for unknown reasons.

programme.title: Underworld: Evolution
programme.desc: Picking up directly from the previous movie, vampire warrior Selene and the half werewolf Michael hunt for clues to reveal the history of their races and the war between them.

programme.title: Mr. Right
programme.desc: A girl falls for the "perfect" guy, who happens to have a very fatal flaw: he's a hitman on the run from the crime cartels who employ him.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: A New Jersey guy dedicated to his family, friends, and church, develops unrealistic expectations from watching porn and works to find happiness and intimacy with his potential true love.

programme.title: The Secret Scripture
programme.desc: A woman keeps a diary of her extended stay at a mental hospital.

programme.title: Hirokin
programme.desc: A reluctant samurai with a dark past sets off on a mission to fulfill his destiny.

programme.title: The Zero Theorem
programme.desc: A hugely talented but socially isolated computer operator is tasked by Management to prove the Zero Theorem: that the universe ends as nothing, rendering life meaningless. But meaning is what he already craves.

programme.title: Out for A Kill
programme.desc: An unsuspecting university professor is an unwitting accomplice in a foiled Chinese cocaine deal. Wrongly imprisoned, he escapes to take his revenge and prove his innocence.

programme.title: Cat.8: Night 1
programme.desc: An untested global defence system triggers a swarm of devastating solar flares, resulting in catastrophic earthquakes and ferocious magnetic storms; an unprecedented CAT. 8 Armageddon. Can we stop the annihilation of the human race?

programme.title: Cat.8: Night 2
programme.desc: Much to the world's surprise, the sun releases a gigantic coronal mass ejection, as the elite task force of the dangerous secretary of defence is hot on Ranger and Whitlow's trail. They are mankind's last hope. Can they save us once more?

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: An elite hitman teaches his trade to an apprentice who has a connection to one of his previous victims.

programme.title: Charlie Countryman
programme.desc: While travelling abroad, a guy falls for a Romanian beauty whose unreachable heart has its origins in her violent, charismatic ex.

programme.title: Generation Um...
programme.desc: Three adults during a single day in New York City filled with sex, drugs, and indecision.

programme.title: The Order
programme.desc: A playboy criminal contacts his dad after stealing a Faberge egg. Later it seems his dad has gone missing in Israel so he heads there. His disappearance is linked to the religious sect: The Order. Lots of fight and chase scenes.

programme.title: The Peacekeeper
programme.desc: When a terrorist group steals the US President's personal communications computer for launching the US arsenal in case of war, only a heroic Major has the key to prevent a Presidential assassination or a nuclear holocaust.

programme.title: The Philly Kid
programme.desc: A former NCAA champion wrestler, paroled after ten years in prison, agrees to a series of cage fights to save a friend's life and is asked to do the impossible - lose.

programme.title: 1275 Days
programme.desc: 15-year-old Blake faces life in prison for felony murder after a botched home invasion. His single mom and girlfriend support his David vs. Goliath legal battle in Elkhart, Indiana, seeking a second chance.

programme.title: Kill Craft
programme.desc: Marina lives with her disabled mother and her hit man father. When he dies at work, she must take charge of the family business and take care of her mother. Marked to die, Marina must navigate the world of assassins to survive.

programme.title: WTA TOUR 2025
programme.desc: The WTA is one of the worlds most recognizable and high-profile sports organizations, consisting of more than 1650 players representing approximately 85 nations, all competing to earn WTA rankings points and prestigious tournament titles.

programme.title: NHL 2024 - 25
programme.desc: A professional ice hockey league in North America composed of 32 Member Clubs 25 in the United States and 7 in Canada.

programme.desc: The largest pro wrestling promotion in the world. It has promoted some of the most successful wrestlers and storylines, and featured some of the most iconic and significant matches and moments in the history of sports entertainment.

programme.title: WWE SMACKDOWN

programme.title: WWE RAW
programme.desc: The largest pro wrestling promotion in the world. It has promoted some of the most successful wrestlers and storylines, and featured some of the most iconic and significant matches and moments in the history of sports entertainment.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 4 Episode 13
programme.desc: The team arrives in Washington, D.C. and the secret of Warren's dreams is revealed.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 5 Episode 1
programme.desc: Warren is nursed back to health by an attractive homesteader. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 5 Episode 2
programme.desc: In the outpost Altura, 10K searched for Red, Murphy encounters Sun Mei and Doc runs into Citizen Z.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 5 Episode 3
programme.desc: Panic and anti-talker sentiments flare after an explosion derails the vote and rumors blame a talker.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 5 Episode 4
programme.desc: 10K and Red attend a ceremony for those lost in Altura. Warren, Doc, Citizen Z and George arrive in Pacifica

programme.title: Z Nation Season 5 Episode 5

programme.title: Z Nation Season 5 Episode 6

programme.title: Z Nation Season 5 Episode 7

programme.title: Z Nation Season 5 Episode 8

programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.desc: Estes imprisons the captive talkers and blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

programme.title: 29 Palms
programme.desc: This is the story of a bag of money and the people who come into contact with it.

programme.desc: Dean has PTSD after a wet-job gone bad in Bosnia. Waiting for his police girlfriend at a diner, some bad guys inject him with a hallucinogen. It sends him back to traumatic experiences in Bosnia and he reacts violently.

programme.desc: A young man tries to help a teenage girl find the serial killer who murdered her parents before the killer comes after them.

programme.title: Every Breath You Take
programme.desc: A psychiatrist whose client commits suicide finds his family life disrupted after introducing her surviving brother to his wife and daughter.

programme.title: Stargate The Ark Of Truth
programme.desc: SG-1 search for an Ancient artifact called the Ark of Truth to finally defeat the Ori. There's just one problem: the Ark is in the Ori's galaxy.

programme.title: No Man's Land
programme.desc: When a vigilante border patrol turns fatal, a man flees on horseback to Mexico, seeking forgiveness from the victim's father.

programme.title: Daughter of the Wolf
programme.desc: A military veteran hunts the men who kidnapped her son.

programme.title: Ride Along
programme.desc: Security guard Ben must prove himself to his girlfriend's brother, top police officer James. He rides along James on a 24-hour patrol of Atlanta.

programme.title: The Turning
programme.desc: A young governess is hired to look after an orphaned girl, but the return of the girl's problematic brother uncovers secrets from their past.

programme.title: 2 Guns

programme.title: The Invisible Man

programme.title: Hanna
programme.desc: A sixteen-year-old girl who was raised by her father to be the perfect assassin is dispatched on a mission across Europe, tracked by a ruthless intelligence agent and her operatives.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: A journalist must investigate a mysterious videotape which seems to cause the death of anyone one week to the day after they view it.

programme.title: Morbius
programme.desc: Biochemist Michael Morbius tries to cure himself of a rare blood disease, but he inadvertently infects himself with a form of vampirism instead.

programme.title: Soldiers Of Fortune
programme.desc: Wealthy thrill-seekers pay huge premiums to have themselves inserted into military adventures, only this time things don't go exactly to plan.

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A freelancing former U.S. Intelligence Agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by the Irish and the Russians.

programme.title: Rocky Balboa

programme.title: Old
programme.desc: A vacationing family discovers that the secluded beach where they're relaxing for a few hours is somehow causing them to age rapidly, reducing their entire lives into a single day.

programme.title: Sherlock Gnomes
programme.desc: Garden gnomes, Gnomeo and Juliet recruit renowned detective Sherlock Gnomes to investigate the mysterious disappearance of other garden ornaments.

programme.title: Yours, Mine & Ours

programme.title: Boy Erased
programme.desc: The son of a Baptist preacher unwillingly participates in a church-supported gay conversion program after being forcibly outed to his parents.

programme.title: Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Two overly-imaginative pranksters hypnotize their grumpy principal into thinking he's a ridiculously enthusiastic, incredibly dimwitted, underwear-themed superhero.

programme.title: Eat Pray Love
programme.desc: A married woman realizes how unhappy her marriage really is, and that her life needs to go in a different direction. After a painful divorce, she takes off on a round-the-world journey to "find herself".

programme.title: 13 Going on 30

programme.title: Madame Web

programme.title: Step Brothers
programme.desc: Two aimless middle-aged losers still living at home are forced against their will to become roommates when their parents marry.

programme.title: Brooklyn's Finest

programme.title: The Girl in the Spider's Web

programme.title: Easy Living
programme.desc: A 14-year-old kid, a young woman who smuggles medicines up and down the Italian border with France and a bizarre American tennis teacher who dreams of being a painter. Their lives take a turn when they meet an illegal migrant.

programme.title: A Murder Of Crows A Vigilante Justice
programme.desc: When a ransom demand suddenly appears, the disappearance of 19-year-old Tim Jatzkowski is now a cause of concern. While the boys father wants the police to rescue him, inspector Martin Brhl tries to convince his family to pay the ransom.

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: March 1984, a few miles off the south coast of Iceland, a fishing boat sank with all its men. One of the crew members miraculously survived. After six hours in the ocean, the exhausted man is washed ashore, only to find himself on a deadly lava field.

programme.title: Suro
programme.desc: A young, vulnerable couple inherits a cork-harvesting farm in rural Catalonia. As newly fledged landowners, they dream of building a fair and sustainable life, only to find their ideals clash head-on with their dire need to make money.

programme.title: Black As The Snow
programme.desc: A serial killer is on the rampage in the ski resort of Morzine-Avoriaz. Vivier, French police officer teams up with the Swiss policeman Meyer to investigate the suspicious deaths of teenagers. They must find the killer before the victim list grows.

programme.title: Cloves & Carnations
programme.desc: In snowy and desolate South Eastern Anatolian, Musa carries the corpse of his deceased wife to their homeland with his granddaughter. As they get closer to a country at war, their run-in with the police separates them in different directions.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: Thomas has it all: family and career at its best. But when his companys most lucrative deal ever is about to close, something goes terribly wrong. He is arrested for the murder of his business partner when his fingerprint is found on the murder weapon.

programme.title: Lucky Girl
programme.desc: TV star Nina Sokil is diagnosed with bone cancer, but deeming her career to be more important with her health, Nina goes to absurd lengths to hide her condition so that she keeps working.

programme.title: Human Capital
programme.desc: Lake Como, Italy. A cyclist is hit off the road by a jeep in the night before Christmas Eve. What happened that night? How will this accident change the destiny of the rich Bernaschi family and the Rovelli family on the edge of bankruptcy?

programme.title: Khutulun: The Wrestling Princess
programme.desc: Princess Khutulun, a formidable Mongol warrior descended from Genghis Khan, has her marriage ambushed by an assassin who steals the Golden Sutra. Vowing revenge, Khutulun and her clan set out on an epic journey to retrieve the sacred text and restore peace.

programme.title: Easy Living
programme.desc: A 14-year-old kid, a young woman who smuggles medicines up and down the Italian border with France and a bizarre American tennis teacher who dreams of being a painter. Their lives take a turn when they meet an illegal migrant.

programme.title: Black As The Snow 2: Dead At The Summit
programme.desc: An SUV races over the cliffs into the depths - the driver is killed instantly. The dead man was apparently involved in a robbery but there is no trace of the loot. French Officer Vivier and Swiss Captain Meyer once again team up to solve the mystery.

programme.title: The Boss and The Cutie
programme.desc: Tot is a rising boss of Neopolitan organised crime. Rosetta is a little girl in the fifth grade. After encountering nasty accidents and falling into comas, the both of them wake up in the hospital to find that they are trapped in the others body.

programme.title: A House In Jerusalem
programme.desc: Grappling with the loss of her mother, Rebecca and her father relocate to Jerusalem for a fresh start. In the eerie Valley of the Ghosts, strange occurrences unfold, and Rebecca embarks on a journey to unravel the mysteries within the old house and city.

programme.title: Aurora (2019)
programme.desc: Aurora, a commitment-phobic party animal, meets Iranian Darian one night at a hot-dog stand in Lapland. Darian is running from death and Aurora is running from love. They need each other to finally stop running.

programme.title: FBI S5 - EP 1
programme.desc: Special agents Maggie Bell and Zidan from the New York branch of the FBI work together to keep the city and country safe.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S42 - EP 6
programme.desc: Ryan Seacrest takes over as the new host for the well-loved gameshow.

programme.title: National Stem Championship 2025 - EP 1
programme.desc: National Stem Championship 2025

programme.title: Britain's Brightest Celebrity Family S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Quiz battle-axe the Governess, also known as Anne Hegerty, hosts as eight celebrity families take part in a knockout tournament as they attempt to win 25,000 for their chosen charity and the title of 'Britain's Brightest Celebrity Family'.

programme.title: Lingo UK S3 - EP 29
programme.desc: Lingo is the fast paced word-play game that keeps on innovating for new audiences, with its mix of skill, tension, humour and the chance to win big cash prizes. Teams are pitted against each other in a battle to fill in the blanks and find words.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S5 - EP 7
programme.desc: Nature is a tempestuous beast, capable of destruction on a level so devastating and claimed the lives of millions. In recent years, these extreme weather events have become more and more commonplace. Using incredible archive and astonishing user-generated footage of some of the most extraordinary weather the planet has ever seen, we'll relive these weather spectacles in astonishing minute by minute detail.

programme.title: Cooking Up A Fortune - EP 16
programme.desc: Brand new series where the UK's most passionate cooks get a once-in-a-lifetime chance to launch their own food brand to the British public. Cooking Up a Fortune sees amateur foodies, who dream of escaping the rat race and cooking for a living, create and sell their dishes to hundreds of real diners in a purpose-built food arena. Each week the winning kitchen gets to launch their idea for a food business to paying customers in one of Europe's busiest food markets.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off Series 11: An Extra Slice - EP 6

programme.title: 50 Summer Sizzlers! 1970-1979 - EP1

programme.desc: Robin banks with 7 hours of 70s songs that make you feel great! From disco & punk to Abba classics & Queen anthems.

programme.title: Lucky Girl
programme.desc: TV star Nina Sokil is diagnosed with bone cancer, but deeming her career to be more important with her health, Nina goes to absurd lengths to hide her condition so that she keeps working.

programme.title: Cloves & Carnations
programme.desc: In snowy and desolate South Eastern Anatolian, Musa carries the corpse of his deceased wife to their homeland with his granddaughter. As they get closer to a country at war, their run-in with the police separates them in different directions.

programme.title: Khutulun: The Wrestling Princess
programme.desc: Princess Khutulun, a formidable Mongol warrior descended from Genghis Khan, has her marriage ambushed by an assassin who steals the Golden Sutra. Vowing revenge, Khutulun and her clan set out on an epic journey to retrieve the sacred text and restore peace.

programme.title: Black As The Snow 2: Dead At The Summit
programme.desc: An SUV races over the cliffs into the depths - the driver is killed instantly. The dead man was apparently involved in a robbery but there is no trace of the loot. French Officer Vivier and Swiss Captain Meyer once again team up to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Lost Transport
programme.desc: Spring 1945. A train deporting hundreds of Jewish prisoners gets stranded near a small German village occupied by the Red Army. A chance encounter between German girl Winnie, Dutch Jew Simone and Russian Vera leads to an unexpected friendship.

programme.title: The Boss and The Cutie
programme.desc: Tot is a rising boss of Neopolitan organised crime. Rosetta is a little girl in the fifth grade. After encountering nasty accidents and falling into comas, the both of them wake up in the hospital to find that they are trapped in the others body.

programme.title: Three Times Nothing
programme.desc: When three homeless friends win the lottery, they assume their lives are going to change drastically for the better. But claiming the money turns out to be more of a problem than a solution.

programme.title: A House In Jerusalem
programme.desc: Grappling with the loss of her mother, Rebecca and her father relocate to Jerusalem for a fresh start. In the eerie Valley of the Ghosts, strange occurrences unfold, and Rebecca embarks on a journey to unravel the mysteries within the old house and city.

programme.title: A Murder Of Crows Hush Little Baby
programme.desc: After a lantern parade, two-year-old Paulina is found missing from her room. The chilling kidnapping hurls Investigator Martin Bruhl back into a sleepless nightmare he experienced two years ago.

programme.title: Aurora (2019)
programme.desc: Aurora, a commitment-phobic party animal, meets Iranian Darian one night at a hot-dog stand in Lapland. Darian is running from death and Aurora is running from love. They need each other to finally stop running.

programme.title: The Second
programme.desc: An author's success following the release of her celebrated erotic memoir is threatened when her best friend and muse reveals the truth behind the memoir's provenance, igniting an incendiary tale of sex, lies and betrayal.

programme.title: Veins Of The World
programme.desc: After his father dies in a tragic car accident, 11-year-old Amra sets out to continue his fathers vision of the traditional nomad way of life and to continue his fight against global mining companies who threaten to destroy it.

programme.title: Wonderfully Beautiful
programme.desc: Ranging from a 60-year-old retiree who no longer finds herself desirable to a daughter trying to make her breakthrough as a model, five women of different ages confront their self-image and the expectation they have for themselves and the people around them.

programme.title: La La La at Rock Bottom
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Shigeo loses his memory in a brutal attack. Taken in by Kasumi, he becomes the lead singer of a band and lives a new life- until memories of his dark past begin to return.
